data.message: I keep getting contacted by someone who claims to be with Facebook, she says I have won 300,000.00 but I must pay 455.00 to get it........ What do I do to find out if this is real or scam?

replies.message: Hey Nancy. This sounds like a hoax. We suggest that you don't provide any personal information and report spam using these tips: http://on.fb.me/1UpubeX. -Rey
Lol are you serious? did you applied for any kind of job at FB? do you think they will just message you: "hey we can give you money, pay us and then work for us." Come on...

Michael, I like your comment/posting immensely!  I agree... why would someone be contacting me (saying a Coordinator at FB to want to give me money for Xmas Lottery, and that I would have to pay Fed Ex for delivery?  TOTAL SCAM, I feel.
It happens it was sent to me and verified .. They have not responded ,, but to ensure the integrity of Facebook they will .. That's the least they could do.

FYI nancy, in general if you've won money you usually don't have to pay to get your winnings, also don't do that over the phone either 😁 one of the things I hate most is when people tell me they let someone take over their computer and lock it up and in order to make it work again they have to pay X amount of dollars. Be safe out there everyone and don't give personal information out to just anybody!

I have just been contacted  by s lady claiming she is from fb coordinater and that I was selected for 2016 promo by mark zuckerberg for a share in the profits and I was  choose with this number and I don't trust people very easy. So I'm thinking is this a scam and I asked the lady what I needed  to do to claim my winning and now I haven't got any response.on how to claim my winning.and what would fb be contacting me at this time it's 12:30 were I am and she claiming to be one he ahead it's 1:30 am her time. So who do I contact if this is a scam so they can get these people from doing this
She has responded  and want me to verify who I am and I got her  email but I don't want to give me info her name given is Christine Rachael Hunter
